text: Natalya Yevgenyevna Gorbanevskaya (; 26 May 1936 - 29 November 2013) was a Russian poet, journalist, translator of Polish literature and civil rights activist. She was born in Moscow. She graduated from the Saint Petersburg State University in 1964. In 2005, she became a citizen of Poland. Gorbanevskaya died on 29 November 2013 at her home in Paris, France. She was aged 77. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Civil rights activists Category:Polish writers Category:Russian poets Category:Russian translators Category:Writers from Moscow Category:Soviet dissidents Category:Russian activists
title: Natalya Gorbanevskaya
